DASH Online

VN:F [1.9.22_1171]
please wait...
Rating: 6.2/10 (205 votes cast)

When searching for DASH Online, beware. Beware at least until they relaunch a DASH Online shop. For the most-part, DASH clothing that is on the shelves in the 3 physical locations is not available online. The DASH Online Store never really got off the ground. It finally came to a total hault, when in the fall of 2009 ShopDASHOnline.com was taken down. There was no immediate or subsequent explanation for this.

Searching For DASH Online ?

When shopping online, be wary of potential counterfeiters. There are only a few authorized distributors of Kardashian brand clothing.
